original_title: Constance, ou la symphonie des baisers
overview: Constance is a beautiful woman and a lonely painter at the same time. One morning, she receives a birth announcement from a good friend and realizes how lonely she really is. She decides to make up her mind about men in an unexpected way.
tagline: How to make up your mind about men without words.
title: Constance, or the Symphony of Kisses
